description:
A versatile pack with cross-over potential. Great for gear-intensive trips to climb or tag summits, or for overnight backpacking, this pack easily handles up to 20kg. The LightWire™ frame transfers weight to a comfortable harness and hipbelt, and multiple access options lets you get to your gear without having to unpack everything.

  • AirScape™ suspension with LightWire frame and die-cut back panel transfer load while maintaining airflow to your back
  • LightWire peripheral frame effectively transfers the load from harness to hipbelt
  • Height-adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle
  • Front panel shove-it pocket and daisy chains for securing extra gear
  • Top lid with large, zippered pocket and under lid zippered mesh pocket with key clip
  • Stow-on-the-Go trekking pole attachments let you stash your poles without removing the pack
  • Bottom zippered compartment provides a dedicated home for your sleeping bag
  • Side compression straps and removable sleeping pad straps cinch in the load and allow you to attach extra gear
  • Hydration sleeve holds a 3L reservoir (sold separately)
  • Integrated rain cover keeps your stuff dry during rainy trips
name: Osprey Kestrel 58 Backpack - Men's
